nodes.name: getCCT
checkCCT
transferCCT

attributes.name: getCCT
checkCCT
transferCCT

checkCCT(address).details: Function to check the amount of CCT the msg.sender has

params.ad: address of the recipient that wants to check their DT

checkCCT(address).return: A uint256 representing the amount of DT owned by the msg.sender.

getCCT(address,uint256).details: Function to give CCT to the recipient for a given wei amount

params.recipient: address of the recipient that wants to buy the DT
params.weiAmt: uint256 amount indicating the amount of wei that was passed

getCCT(address,uint256).return: A uint256 representing the amount of DT bought by the msg.sender.

transferCCT(address,uint256).details: Function to transfer the credit from the owner to the recipient

params.amt: uint256 aount of DT to transfer
params.recipient: address of the recipient that will gain in DT
